password: 🔑 Use complex, unique passwords for each account.
🔒 Avoid using common words in your passwords.
scam: 📧 Be cautious of emails asking for personal info.
privacy: 🕵️ Use privacy settings on social media.
🌐 Avoid sharing sensitive info on public Wi-Fi.
phishing: ⚠️ Don’t click links from unknown senders.
